select.id: get直近の年次負担割合判定処理

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" as dbT7022 WHERE dbT7022."subGyomuCode" = 'DBC' AND dbT7022."shoriName"=#{処理名} AND dbT7022."kijunTimestamp" <> '' ORDER BY dbT7022."nendo" DESC, dbT7022."shoriEdaban" DESC LIMIT 1

select.id: get処理年度の異動分利用者負担割合判定_過年度のデータ

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" as dbT7022 WHERE dbT7022."subGyomuCode" = 'DBC' AND dbT7022."shoriName"=#{処理名} ORDER BY dbT7022."shoriEdaban" DESC LIMIT 1

select.id: get異動分利用者負担割合判定のデータ

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" as dbT7022 WHERE dbT7022."subGyomuCode" = 'DBC' AND dbT7022."shoriName"=#{処理名} AND dbT7022."nendo" < #{年次判定年度} ORDER BY dbT7022."nendo" DESC, dbT7022."shoriEdaban" DESC LIMIT 1
